item.description:
Image streaming is a technique developed by Win Wenger, Ph.D, to simulate Albert Einstein's "thought experiments" and creative strategies that he used to bring his insights into manifestation.

We'll be using it to further articulate and build a vision of a desire you have.  This process will help you to feel your desire as it already exists in your virtual reality and to build your emotional sense of it, thus creating  more of a vibrational match to your desire and enhancing the ease of manifesting it.

Mark has been reading a new book by Dr. Joe Dispenza, Breaking the Habit of Being Yourself. It's filled with neuro-science research on how to best access the quantum field and to change our ineffective patterns of thought, as well as how to more easily manifest what you want; and this exercise is very aligned with what he suggests. It's all very exciting!

It sure worked for Einstein!  And, it's easy and FUN! Come learn and play and create together!
item.how_to_find_us: We're down a long driveway. Look for white mailbox with our name and #276, across from large, old, white house

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: "Image Streaming" into the future
